T02D1367:198b-1: sha dangga yo ga n'a ma /
T02D1367:198b-3: sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1367:198b-4: dpal ldan sha ba ri pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1367:198b-5: sgrib pa'i sprin tshogs dang bral ba /
T02D1367:198b-6: grangs mthar rlung rtog kun 'gag pa'i //
T02D1367:198b-7: bar snang du ni spyan ras gzigs //
T02D1367:198b-8: gang ba'i zla ba 'char te mdzes //
T02D1367:198b-9: sring zhi'i dmigs dang bral yang gang //
T02D1367:198b-10: khyab byed de nyid tha dad min //

T02D1367:198b-12: sa rnams dbang phyug rab mi gnas //
T02D1367:198b-13: g-yo med rtog kun dang bral yang //
T02D1367:198b-14: mkhas la ma nyams bde ba ston //
T02D1367:198b-15: sems min las ni 'char ba'i mgon //
T02D1367:198b-16: 'gro sems byin gyis rlob gyur cig / yod rtog rtag pa'i mthar gyur te //
T02D1367:198b-17: ma dpyad med rtog mnar med rgyu //
T02D1367:198b-18: grol lam de ltar bsubs gyur la //
T02D1367:198b-19: gang zhig sems las 'das pa yi //
T02D1367:198b-20: stong nyid thugs rje tha mi dad //
T02D1367:199a-0: @199a * // nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan ston pa lo //
T02D1367:199a-1: bla ma de la rab dga' bas //
T02D1367:199a-2: rtag tu gus byas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1367:199a-3: de lta'i bla ma dngos chen gyis //
T02D1367:199a-4: bstod pa rang rtog brjod pa nyid //
T02D1367:199a-5: 'bar ba'i me ni med pa na //
T02D1367:199a-6: du ba'i rgyun ni gang la 'byung //
T02D1367:199a-7: rtogs brjod pa yi skyon yin mod //
T02D1367:199a-8: 'jug par byed pas gzhan don rgyu //
T02D1367:199a-9: ston pas ma nges dngos po la //
T02D1367:199a-10: dgos don grub 'dod ga la 'jug / drang don rtogs pas khengs pa can //
T02D1367:199a-11: lam las 'khrul pa'i sngags pa rnams //
T02D1367:199a-12: dgag pa 'jug pa'i tshig sgo nas //
T02D1367:199a-13: ma rtogs rtogs phyir sangs rgyas kyi //

T02D1367:199a-15: go bla tshig gis 'jam dbyangs kyis //
T02D1367:199a-16: bka' bsdu'i tshul gyis sham bha lar //
T02D1367:199a-17: dus 'khor bsdus rgyud legs par gsungs //
T02D1367:199a-18: thugs rje chen po'i sprul sku des //
T02D1367:199a-19: t'i ka dri med 'od ces mdzad //
T02D1367:199a-20: de gsal nges don thob nas su //
T02D1367:199a-21: mkhas kun srid du sel zhing rol //
T02D1367:199a-22: gang du ji srid shes bya la //
T02D1367:199a-23: kun mkhyen zhes mtshan don dang ldan //
T02D1367:199a-24: 'khrul zhing snying po med par gyur //

T02D1367:199a-26: mkha' byung sangs rgyas yum gcig gis //

T02D1367:199a-29: gang du dri med nam mkha' la ;
T02D1367:199a-30: / mig phyed brtan par bshad pa na //
T02D1367:199a-31: bde chen stong rtogs rtog med las //
T02D1367:199a-32: du ba la sogs rtog med 'byung //
T02D1367:199a-33: de bas na rdzogs pa'i rim pa gsal bar byed pa /
T02D1367:199a-34: phyag rgya chen po'i lam bsgom pa'i rjes su mthun pa /
T02D1367:199a-35: dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i rgyud nas gsungs pa /
T02D1367:199a-36: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras
T02D1367:199a-37: bu ster bar byed pa'i gsung rab rin chen 'dus
T02D1367:199a-38: par bya ste / sangs rgyas rin chen gyi za
T02D1367:199a-39: ma tog dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud kyi rgyal
T02D1367:199a-41: nyams med bde ldan ye shes dbang can rnam pa kun ldan pa //
T02D1367:199a-42: 'gro kun sgyu ma can gyi thig le rgyal po'i
T02D1367:199a-43: dbang phyug gi / a'a li k'a li nyi zla'i
T02D1367:199a-44: gdan ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i min //
T02D1367:199a-45: h'um yig gyur ba'i sku gzugs dang ni phyag mtshan mi 'dod do //
T02D1367:199a-47: de bas na las dang po po'i rnal 'byor pa
T02D1367:199a-48: ma nyams pa'i mchog bsgrub par mngon par 'dod pa
T02D1367:199a-49: / bla ma dam pa'i man ngag thob pa /
T02D1367:199b-0: ma rungs pa'i @199b grogs spangs pa /
T02D1367:199b-1: du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma la goms pa rtsa dbu ma sbyangs pa /

T02D1367:199b-3: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bden pa la brten pa /
T02D1367:199b-4: rang lus dang bu dang chung ma la sogs pa la ltos pa med pa //
T02D1367:199b-5: dgon pa dang gtsug lag khang dang /
T02D1367:199b-6: bla ma'i nor gyi longs spyod las logs pa /
T02D1367:199b-7: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i lam bsten pa /
T02D1367:199b-8: byams pa snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa /
T02D1367:199b-9: zhi ba la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi grub pa sgrub pa'i 'dod pa dang bral pa /
T02D1367:199b-10: thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phong thob par 'dod pa ;
T02D1367:199b-11: / chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i
T02D1367:199b-12: stong pa nyid kyi me long la phra phab pa
T02D1367:199b-13: bzhin du ma skyes pa'i chos mthong ba mig yor
T02D1367:199b-14: dang rmi lam lta bu rang bzhin can /
T02D1367:199b-15: rdul phra rab kyi phung po'i chos kyi brtag dpyad dang bral ba /
T02D1367:199b-16: chad pa'i stong nyid ring du byas pa /
T02D1367:199b-17: nang gi bde ba rang rig pa'i chos la rjes su chags pa /
T02D1367:199b-18: phyi'i dbang po'i bde ba yongs su spangs pa /
T02D1367:199b-19: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid byang chub kyi
T02D1367:199b-20: sems brtan par byed pa kho na la brtson pa
T02D1367:199b-21: can / bde ba chen po'i mchog shes rab ye
T02D1367:199b-22: shes kyi lam gyi man ngag thob pas rten dang
T02D1367:199b-23: can / rten can dang / phyag mtshan dang /
T02D1367:199b-26: dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa mi 'dod ces bya'o //
T02D1367:199b-28: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i de nyid ni //
T02D1367:199b-29: bcu drug bzhi ru rab phye bas //
T02D1367:199b-30: sna tshogs rnam rtog lam gyis ni //
T02D1367:199b-31: brgya lam med pas mi 'thob bo //
T02D1367:199b-32: h'um phat la sogs rtog ba can //
T02D1367:199b-33: bskyed pa'i rim pa las 'das pa //
T02D1367:199b-34: rdzogs rim sbyor ba de nyid ni //
T02D1367:199b-35: de nyid rgyu yin gzhan min no //
T02D1367:199b-36: de ni shing la gnas pa yang //
T02D1367:199b-37: dum bur gtubs kyang mthong ba med //
T02D1367:199b-38: gtsub shing gtsub stan gtsubs pa las //
T02D1367:199b-39: de nyid du ni mthong ba ltar //
T02D1367:199b-40: rnam rtog goms pa'i thabs kun gyis //
T02D1367:199b-41: sems kyi snang tshul mi mthong mod //
T02D1367:199b-42: ro ma rkyang ma gcig sbyor bas //
T02D1367:199b-43: de nyid du ni de snang 'gyur //
T02D1367:199b-44: du ba la sogs mtshan ma yin //
T02D1367:199b-45: dbu mar rgyu ba srog rtsol gyis //
T02D1367:199b-46: rig ma brtul zhugs rtag ma nyam //
T02D1367:199b-47: byang sems gyen du rgyu ba yis //
T02D1367:199b-48: sangs rgyas kun lam 'di yis ni //
T02D1367:199b-50: pho nya kun gyi lhan skyes yang //
T02D1367:200a-2: gzugs la sogs pa'i rtog ba can //
T02D1367:200a-3: dkyil 'khor la sogs sbom pa pos //
T02D1367:200a-6: sems can snying rje gzhan don dang //
T02D1367:200a-7: rtag tu dge ba brtson pa'o //
T02D1367:200a-8: rnam par dag pa'i slob ma yis //
T02D1367:200a-9: bla ma'i drin gyis lam mchog thob //
T02D1367:200a-10: lam mchog rin chen legs pa 'di //
T02D1367:200a-11: bag med mi la byin kyang ni //
T02D1367:200a-12: rang khyim nags su zhugs pa yi //
T02D1367:200a-14: bag med le lo the tshom dang //
T02D1367:200a-15: gnyid dang 'gyod pa chom rkun gyi //
T02D1367:200a-16: nye du'i nags nang zhugs pa yis //
T02D1367:200a-18: srog gcod ma byin len dang brdzun //
T02D1367:200a-19: phra ma tshig rtsub gzhan bud med //
T02D1367:200a-20: ngag 'khyal ba rnab sems gnod sems dang //
T02D1367:200a-21: log lta'i chom rkun gyis kyang 'phrog / bza' btung shin tu tshad med dang //
T02D1367:200a-22: longs spyod du ma'i chom rkun gyis //
T02D1367:200a-23: bag med rgyal 'gyur rmongs pa'i ltar //
T02D1367:200a-25: rin chen yin min mi shes pa //
T02D1367:200a-26: gzhan mi mkhas la ston par byed //
T02D1367:200a-27: rin thang med pa'i ri na chen de //
T02D1367:200a-28: mi mkhas tshig gis skal med 'gyur //
T02D1367:200a-29: rin chen yon tan mkhas pa la //
T02D1367:200a-30: mi shes de ni bstan par bya //
T02D1367:200a-31: de yi rnam dag tshig gis ni //
T02D1367:200a-32: rang gi rin chen shes par bya //
T02D1367:200a-33: pha ma bu mo srid mo nu //
T02D1367:200a-34: spun dang yid 'ong chung ma dang //
T02D1367:200a-35: sangs rgyas byang sems kun gyi yang //
T02D1367:200a-36: gzugs kyi bdud ni geg byed do //
T02D1367:200a-37: chom rkun nye du spangs nas su //
T02D1367:200a-38: 'bad de slob mas rin chen las //
T02D1367:200a-39: bla ma dam pa'i drin las byung //
T02D1367:200a-40: thos nas shin tu gsang bar bya //
T02D1367:200a-41: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim pa dang //
T02D1367:200a-42: dpa' bo'i rim pa thar lam min //
T02D1367:200a-43: shin tu rnam dag rim pa nyid //
T02D1367:200a-44: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs grol phyir ro //
T02D1367:200a-45: gang gis dbang bskur ngon nyid kyis //
T02D1367:200a-46: shes rab thabs dang ldan rgyud du //
T02D1367:200a-47: mtshams med lnga dang ldan rnams kyang //
T02D1367:200a-48: bde bsangs rgyas kyis bsdu byas //
T02D1367:200a-49: dpa' bo'i rim pa phyi min te //
T02D1367:200a-50: lus la srog rlung zad byed yin //
T02D1367:200a-51: nam mkhar khams gsum snang ba gang //
T02D1367:200a-52: bdag byin brlab par de bshad do //
T02D1367:200a-53: 'khor ba snying po med pa la //
T02D1367:200a-54: de zad pas ni de nyid las //
T02D1367:200b-0: chu @200b shing zad pas de 'bras ltar //
T02D1367:200b-2: rta bla mo dang sdig srin ni //

T02D1367:200b-4: sgyu ma las byung rnal 'byor sems //
T02D1367:200b-5: de ltar sgyu ma gsod par byed //
T02D1367:200b-6: gnyis med mi g-yo rgyu med dang //
T02D1367:200b-7: yi dam ma nyams chags chen dang //
T02D1367:200b-8: dngos po dngos min ma yin pa //
T02D1367:200b-9: ye shes sems dpa' kun du bzang //
T02D1367:200b-10: sgra med sgra chen lhan skyes dang //
T02D1367:200b-11: byang sems thig le 'dzin pa'i dpal //
T02D1367:200b-12: dus kyi 'khor lo'i rdo rje dang //
T02D1367:200b-13: rnal 'byor shes rab thabs dang ldan //
T02D1367:200b-14: de ltar rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gang //

T02D1367:200b-23: bdud 'joms rdo rje sems grags pa'i //

T02D1367:200b-25: lha yi dmigs pa rnam pa gnyis //
T02D1367:200b-26: mngon sum dang ni rjes dpag go //
T02D1367:200b-27: de nyid sbyor bas nam mkha' la //
T02D1367:200b-28: skar ma ltar ni mngon sum du //

T02D1367:200b-30: yongs su ma smin rnal 'byor la //
T02D1367:200b-31: goms phyir ri mo la sogs pa //

T02D1367:200b-33: shi ba'i ro ltar rjes dpag go //
T02D1367:200b-34: 'dir sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis rnal 'byor
T02D1367:200b-35: pa rnams la lha'i dmigs pa rnam pa gnyis te
T02D1367:200b-36: / mngon sum dang ni rjes dpag go //
T02D1367:200b-37: de nyid las mngon sum ni de kho na nyid
T02D1367:200b-38: kyi sbyor bas nam mkha' la skar ma bzhin du
T02D1367:200b-39: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku du ma sgyu ma dang
T02D1367:200b-40: rmi lam lta bu dus gsum gyi srid pa gsum

T02D1367:200b-43: pa'i rnal 'byor pas sha'i mig gis sna tshogs gzugs
T02D1367:200b-44: brnyan mthong ngo // mngon shes byung nas lha'i mig gis mthong ngo ;
T02D1367:200b-45: /'dod chags dang bral bas na sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis spyan gyis gzigs so //
T02D1367:200b-46: byang chub sems dpar gyur nas shes rab kyi mig gis so //
T02D1367:200b-47: yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa na ye shes kyi mig gis te /
T02D1367:200b-48: phung po lhag ma dang bral bas so //
T02D1367:201a-0: de ltar stong pa nyid mthong ba'i slad du de bzhin @201a * //
T02D1367:201a-1: gshegs pas mig lnga ste sha'i mig la sogs pa'o //

T02D1367:201a-3: la dmus long nyid yin no zhes de kho na

T02D1367:201a-6: med par rjes dpag de shi ba'i lus dang 'dra
T02D1367:201a-7: ba don dam pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa ri

T02D1367:201a-11: ram bris nas blos smon pa'i rnal 'byor la bsgom
T02D1367:201a-12: pa'i phyir nges pa'i rnam pa can brtan par bya

T02D1367:201a-17: pad rdor las byung bdud rtsis so //
T02D1367:201a-18: sgrub pa dga' ba la sogs dang //

T02D1367:201a-20: sgrub chen phra ba'i rnal 'byor dang //
T02D1367:201a-21: ma nyams rig ma'i sbyor bas so //
T02D1367:201a-22: 'dir las dang po bas thog mar sgrub thabs kyi cho gas bsnyen par bya ste /
T02D1367:201a-23: phyi'i bdud rtsi ldan ni bshad ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1367:201a-24: sogs kyi sgras ni sgron ma lnga'o //

T02D1367:201a-26: lha mnyes pa'i phyir nge zos pas bsnyen pa'o //
T02D1367:201a-27: sogs pa'i sgras sgron ma lnga ni dbang po lnga'o //

T02D1367:201a-29: lus dang nor gyi sred pa yengs su sbong ba'o //
T02D1367:201a-30: bsnyen pa des lhas mchog sbyin te bshad pa la sogs pa zos pas ma yin no //
T02D1367:201a-31: rdo rje bzhi ni lus ngag yid gsum kyi [*gyi] longs spyod pa la ltos pa med pa dang /
T02D1367:201a-32: nyams pa'i bde ba la ltos pa med pa ste
T02D1367:201a-33: lus ngag yid gsum tshangs par spyod pa'i brtul zhugs
T02D1367:201a-34: kyi don to // 'dis lhas mchog sbyin gyi sred pa'i longs spyod la ltos pas ma yin na //

T02D1367:201a-38: sgrub pa thun mong gi phreng bas bzlas pa la sogs pa ni drang don to //

T02D1367:201a-40: 'khor ba pa'i zas ni mig la sogs pas gzugs la sogs pa gzung ba'o //

T02D1367:201b-0: stong nyid kyi @201b gzugs brnyan la gzhan mig la
T02D1367:201b-2: de bzhin du bsam gtan dang srog rtsol dang 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1367:201b-3: des don du rdo rje dang padma las byung ba'i bdud rtsis nye ba'i sgrub pa'o //
T02D1367:201b-4: drang don du 'khor gyi lha kun bskyed pa'o //

T02D1367:201b-10: ba'i rnal 'byor ni rtsa dbu ma la gyen du

T02D1367:201b-13: drang don du shes rab ma'i chos 'byung gi sna'i rtse mor thig le'i sbyor bal sogs pa'o //
T02D1367:201b-14: stong nyid byang chub thog ma ru //

T02D1367:201b-21: bsgrub pa sgrub chen ngag la yang //
T02D1367:201b-22: 'dir bskyed pa'i rim pas thog mar stong pa nyid
T02D1367:201b-23: las byang chub pa ni sems can rnam la tha

T02D1367:206a-13: dngos po stong pa'i don mthong phyir //
T02D1367:206a-14: dngos po med las don yod min //

T02D1367:206a-26: gal te med pa'i gzugs mthong na //
